DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , split-face , placebo-controlled , double-blind , single-center clinical trial compare topical retinoid half face retinoid plus topical steroid half .
DOC.brief_title: Addition Topical Steroid Topical Retinoid Acne Patients
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , split-face , placebo-controlled , double-blind , single-center clinical trial wherein 20 patient receive daily 0.05 % tretinoin one half face receive triamcinolone 0.025 % half inert emollient 4 week . Subjects continue apply tretinoin 0.05 % daily bilateral face without triamcinolone emollient additional 4 week . Investigator 's Global Assessment , lesion count , study subject 's self-assessments burning/stinging , itching , erythema , dryness/scaling collect 1 , 2 , 4 , 8 week .
